alert.note: Alert for Bent (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 06 at 6:48AM MDT until July 07 at 4:01AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Pueblo CO has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Colorado... Purgatoire River Near Las Animas affecting Bent County. For the Purgatoire River...including Madrid, Trinidad Lake, Trinidad, Las Animas...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Purgatoire River Near Las Animas. * WHEN...From this morning to late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Minor Flood. Minor agricultural flooding occurs into low lying areas along the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:15 AM MDT Thursday the stage was 9.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 6:15 AM MDT Thursday was 9.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 9.4 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late this afternoon. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 9.4 feet on 04/12/2012. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 700 PM MDT.
